rule.name: Use absolute WORKDIR.
rule.description:
Rationale :

By using absolute paths you will not run into problems when a previous WORKDIR instruction changes.
You also often times don't know the WORKDIR context of your base container.

Problematic code :

FROM busybox
WORKDIR usr/src/app

Correct code :

FROM busybox
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

Exceptions :

When using environment replacements. 

FROM busybox
ENV foo /bar
WORKDIR ${foo}   # WORKDIR /bar

rule.name: Last user should not be root.
